alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 18 at 5:39AM PST until November 18 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility a quarter of a mile or less at times in freezing fog. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington and Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. There may also be localized areas of freezing drizzle causing slick roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington
